scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the martyrdom of Saint Sebastian. A man, identified as Saint Sebastian, stands pierced by multiple arrows, his torso bare and his lower body clad in red leggings and a white loincloth. He has a halo, indicating his sainthood. To his left, an archer, dressed in a red tunic, blue hat, and orange leggings, aims his bow and arrow towards Saint Sebastian. A discarded blue garment lies on the ground near the archer, along with a bundle of arrows. In the background, a walled enclosure surrounds a building with a tower, and trees are visible. The scene is set outdoors.
